post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
This is from an agent, contract position for 1 year and $50/hr.
----------------------------
Brendan, Thanks for speaking with me today. As mentioned I am looking for a Software Developer for a Toronto based company.
We need someone with:
Minimum 5-7 years industry experience as a software developer
Experience in object-oriented design and development
Experience developing multithreaded, distributed applications in a client/server or n-tier environment
Experience developing fixed income order management or trading applications is an asset
University degree in computer science, computer engineering or equivalent
Knowledge of data modeling and relational database design
Knowledge of Java, J2EE, and web services is an asset
Please let me know if you or anyone you know may be a fit for this opportunity. Thanks, Brian
Brian Interdonato CSI Search Group Director 800-582-0828 813-215-9313 mobile brian@csisearch.com
post.title: Sr Software Developer - Contract
